question: Could you please see this website and tell me if it is ok to earn an extra income in this manner from www.moresu.info ...
answer:
QUESTION

 

Could you please see this website and tell me if it is ok to earn an extra income in this manner from www.moresu.info

Basically you earn income if you get people to join this university.

Jazaakallah

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

It is permissible for you to subscribe to the scheme. The commission that you receive will be considered as Tabarru (voluntary) and therefore permissible.

And Allah knows best 

 

Checked and Approved by:

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
